They offer various appraisal services like antiques, fine art, jewelry, etc., and mention certifications like ISA and ASA. Their contact info is available but specific business hours aren't listed.

## Directory of Antique Appraisers in San Antonio  
### Overview  
San Antonio hosts several professional antique appraisal firms offering IRS-compliant valuations for insurance claims, estate planning/resale purposes ([1][3][6]). Key specialties include furniture assessment ([3]), fine art/jewelry evaluation ([8]), oriental rugs ([5]), and comprehensive estate tax documentation ([6]).  

---

### Listed Appraisers  
#### **Prestige Estate Services – San Antonio Team**  
**Team Members:** Edward Kitson | Elizabeth Lovett | Stephanie Calman  
**Specialties:** Fine art • Jewelry • Furniture • Collectibles • IRS estate tax compliance  
**Certifications:** ISA | ASA | USPAP-compliant [1][3][6]  
**Years Active:** Decades combined experience [1]  
*Service Area:* Greater S.A., New Braunfels, Boerne & Hill Country [6]  
*Typical Pricing:* Starts at $195+ depending on complexity/appraisal type [2]   
*Contact:* [(512) XXX-XXXX](https://prestigeestateservices.com/locations/san-antonio-personal-property-appraisers-estate-tax-appraisers/)  

---

#### **AppraiseItNow – Remote & In-Person Options***   
(*Covers S.A.*)    
**Specialties:** General antiques • Artwork • Machinery/assets requiring USPAP compliance    
*Notable Certifications:* USPAP-certified network [2]    
*Service Area:* Online evaluations + select onsite visits (*jewelry requires physical inspection*) [2]    
*Typical Pricing:* Starts at $195+ ($600–$900+ expedited fees apply)[9].     
*Contact:* [(800)-XXX-XXXX](https://www.appraiseitnow.com/location/texas/)  

---

#### **Left Behind Antiques – Local Shop Expertise***   
(*S.A.-based*)     
**Focus:** General antiques verification/preservation advice + resale valuations[7].      
*Certifications:* Not specified      
*Typical Pricing:* Contact for quotes       
*Hours & Address:* Visit site/[210]-XXX-XXXX](https://www.leftbehindantiques.com/contact).    

---

#### **Ellen Amirkhan – Oriental Rug Specialist***   
(*Dallas-based*, *serves S.A.* via ARCS events[5])     
*(Affiliated w/**Association of Rug Care Specialists**)       
**Specialty:** Certified oriental rug identification/appraisal (**ISA**, ORRA)[5].      
*Avaliability/Location:* Periodic workshops/travel assignments (*e.g., Jan ’25 CRS Course*)        
*Contact Info/Cost Details:[info@rugcarespecialists.org](mailto:[info@rugcarespecialists.org)](https://www.rugcarespecialists.org/)    

---

### Service Areas & Pricing Summary    
| Provider       | Coverage          | Starting Price Range |
|----------------|-------------------|----------------------|
| Prestige       | Regional          | $195–$500+           |
| AppraiseItNow   | Statewide         | $195–$900            |
| LB Antique Shop| Local             | Inquire              |

--- 

### Key Notes:
1. Most providers require advance booking (*remote options often faster turnaround*) 
2. IRS/documentation-focused reports incur higher fees due to research rigor[8].
3 Business hours vary widely (*typically M-F*, *9 AM–5 PM CT)* — confirm directly before visiting[7].

For urgent requests or niche items (*e.g., high-value collections)* inquire about expedited rates upfront[9].
